# flipVertically

**Instance Property**

A Boolean that flips the definition’s image horizontally.

## Declaration

```swift
var flipVertically: Bool { get set }
```

## Flipping a Tile Vertically or Horizontally

- **flipHorizontally**: A Boolean that flips the definition’s image vertically.

items.description: A Boolean that flips the definition’s image vertically.
